hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e export PATH=$PATH:/opt/cov-analysis/bin/ echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/
python client.py checkout
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug --verbose
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j24" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Rebuild all" cov-configure --gcc cov-build --dir cov-int ./mach --log-no-times build -v
tar zcvf cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
minimumsize=200000 actualsize=$(du -k cov-build.tar.gz | cut -f 1) if [ $actualsize -ge $minimumsize ]; then sh /opt/upload-to-coverity-fx.sh else echo "Unexpected filesize. Should be at least $minimumsize (found $actualize)" exit 1 fi
rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/ exit 0
